projects: This is a spoof product combining the pokemon Chikorita and Chiquita Bananas.  This was one of the first projects I did in Illustrator.
This is a zombified version of the actor Jensen Ackles.  This was one of the first projects I did in Photoshop.
This is the beta version of a custom CSS framework I made in my front end implementation class.  In this framework I made custom elements using SCSS.
projectsVideos: This is a shot for shot recreate of the Greedo/Han scene from Star Wars episode 4.  This was one of the first projects I did in Premiere.
This is a project where we had to create a how to video using Premiere.  Using different shots we showed how to throw a frisbee a couple different ways.
This is a movie trailer made in Premiere based on a movie we made up.  Using different lighting we captured a man hitting an all time low.
